text: @WalshFreedom @kurteichenwald This is my friend he lives in Tucson AZ and now is I a medically induced coma and on ventilator. I am so angry that so many people don’t take this virus seriously. He is 30 and no prexisting conditions.  https://t.co/xGtRuq5W5m
